ActCanadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board Act
PrecisReappointment of JOHN A. CLARKSON of Ottawa, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Canadian Transportation Accident Investigation and Safety Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of six months, effective February 27, 2016.
